0xA274CADB.name: BREAK_OFF_VEHICLE_WHEEL

params.name: deleteWheel
params.description: True to delete wheel, otherwise detach.

params.name: putOnFire
params.description: Set wheel on fire once detached.

0xA274CADB.description: Break off vehicle wheel by index. The `leaveDebrisTrail` flag requires `putOnFire` to be true.

examples.code:
local vehicle = GetVehiclePedIsIn(PlayerPedId())

if DoesEntityExist(vehicle) then
  for i = 0, 3 do
    BreakOffVehicleWheel(vehicle, i, true, false, true, false)
  end
end
